query.value: @concat('SELECT DISTINCT(DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ')) STARTDT FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' ORDER BY STARTDT')
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = ','DATE(''', item().STARTDT, ''')')
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 DAY)')

query.value:
insert into cd_mart.proc_log_t
    (
    job_name
    ,str_time
    ,end_time	      
    ,status
    ,info
    ,err_code
    ,err_desc
    )				
values ( '@{pipeline().Pipeline}', now(), now(),  'E','es_coupon', '@{activity('result chk').output.firstRow.result}' ,'' );

select 1 as rtn;

activities.name: get page
activities.description: 대표 제품의 생성 기간동안 토탈 건수

preCopyScript.value:
delete from cd_ods.tb_sf_neis_school_schedule_t
where atpt_ofcdc_sc_code = '@{variables('ATPT_OFCDC_SC_CODE')}'
and sd_schul_code = '@{variables('SD_SCHUL_CODE')}'

oracleReaderQuery.value: select CD_IF.FUNC_CDI_LOG(  'I' , p_pipline => 'PIP_API_CUSTOMER_ASSOCIATION_TRAN' ) as result from dual;
select CD_IF.FUNC_CDI_LOG(  'I' , p_pipline => 'PIP_API_CUSTOMER_ASSOCIATION_TRAN2' ) as result from dual;
